txt.en: 'There is a large cave within Emyn Ernil to which the Corsairs have taken a particular focus. Within it, there appear to be several crystal formations. While that's not altogether unique, what is peculiar about these crystals is they glow, even in pure darkness.\n\n'The Corsairs have taken a particular interest in these crystals. I do not know why, whether for a military purpose or some ancient ritual. Either way, if they want them, we must know why. Gather some samples and bring them back to me.'
The large cave within Emyn Ernil hosts some very mysterious crystals in which the Corsairs hold great interest.
'They look ordinary to me. I will need to do some further testing to determine if there is anything peculiar or unique about them.'
Crystal shards may be found in the large cave beneath Emyn Ernil.\n\nLhossil asked you to venture beneath Emyn Ernil and recover some crystal shards from the large cave.
Lhossil can be found in Dol Amroth.\n\nLhossil will be pleased to begin examining the crystal shards you found.
